plot outline: Huccha Venkat, a former underworld type, is all set to take the route to reform by starting his Sene. With plans of women's emancipation and helping the needy, he becomes the Messiah. Amidst this, he has a love story and also a tryst with politicians and cops.
title: Porki Huccha Venkat
plot: Huccha Venkat, a former underworld type, is all set to take the route to reform by starting his Sene. With plans of women's emancipation and helping the needy, he becomes the Messiah. Amidst this, he has a love story and also a tryst with politicians and cops.
